text: @marklevinshow what is your point with this?  #Covid19 didn't even exist in 2008... and he was going to a country that had an outbreak of Malaria... so what is it you are trying to prove?  Also, why does everything you braindead cult followers do have to lead back to #obama? #covidiots #134k
